comments: Took him for business communications. barely used the book. no tests and barely any papers. great guy! full of great stories and a really great person over all. taught us a fair amount about PR (he is president of a firm). As long as you attend the classes and do the assignments, you will get an A. TAKE FREEMAN!

he is amazing!!!!!!....i took him for intro to marketing and learned so much...our tests were open book and our final project was so easy...i learned a lot in a class that was an easy A...out of my entire class of 25, 24 of us got A\'s, i think the other person got an A- and thats cause they didn\'t take one of the tests...TAKE HIM!

Awesome profesor, such a kind guy! For a writing intensive course, this class was sooo easy. No tests, just some writing activities/papers. Tells funny real-life stories and has alot of experience as well! TAKE FREEMAN, he\'s the best!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
